elementSpec.desc: represents an intermediate (or internal) node of a tree.
木における非終端ノードを示す．

attDef.desc: provides the value of an intermediate node, which is a feature structure or other analytic element.
当該中間ノードの値を示す．
attDef.valDesc: A valid identifier of a feature structure or other analytic element.

attDef.desc: provides a list of identifiers of the elements which are the children of the intermediate node.
当該中間ノードの子要素の識別子を示す．
provides the identifier of the element which is the parent of this node.
当該中間ノードの親要素の識別子を示す．
attDef.valDesc: The identifier of the parent node.

attDef.desc: indicates whether or not the internal node is ordered.
当該中間ノードは，順序付かどうかを示す．

remarks.p: The value true indicates that the children of the intermediate node are ordered, whereas false indicates the are unordered.
Use if and only if ord is specified as partial on the tree element and the intermediate node has more than one child.

attDef.desc: provides an identifier of the element which this node follows.
当該中間ノードの姉要素相当の識別子を示す．
attDef.valDesc: The identifier of another intermediate node or leaf of the tree.

remarks.p: If the tree is unordered or partially ordered, this attribute has the property of fixing the relative order of the intermediate node and the element which is the value of the attribute.

attDef.desc: gives the out degree of an intermediate node, the number of its children.
当該中間ノードの子要素数を示す．

remarks.p: The in degree of an intermediate node is always 1.
